title: Goal
description: Yannick Bolasie crosses for McArthur to send a looping header into the corner!

title: Goal
description: Bojan shows great skill to set up Jonathan Walters in the area his shot takes a deflection and falls for Crouch to tap home from close range

title: Substitution
description: Sub for Stoke: Bojan is replaced by Marko Arnautovic

title: Substitution
description: Sub for Palace: Jason Puncheon replaces Wilfried Zaha

title: Yellow card
description: Marouane Chamakh is booked for a foul on Walters inside the Stoke penalty area

title: Substitution
description: Sub for Palace: The injured Chamakh limps off to be replaced by Dwight Gayle

title: Substitution
description: Sub for Palace: McArthur replaced by Barry Bannan

title: Yellow card
description: Scott Dann is booked for hauling down Diouf
